author: wrowe
msg: APR DOES NOT simply support TCP STREAM sockets.
We need to look at if IPPROTO_TCP is absolutely required, and if the
correct proto will be inferred for things such as SOCK_DGRAM for udp.
In any case, the existing code was certainly very ugly and not nice.

author: trawick
msg: don't try to use getaddrinfo() on systems without gai_strerror()
this fixes a build error on RedHat 5.2

author: trawick
msg: Fix a problem in Unix apr_file_dup() which caused 0 to be returned

author: trawick
msg: simplify...  get rid of warning for missing memset() decl...

author: trawick
msg: show how we invoke libtool to create libapr.la
